LooseErrorTests.AppDataBeforeHandshake: BoGo expects different error before vs after CCS
LooseErrorTests.PartialFinishedWithServerHelloDone: Unexpected record vs excess handshake data
LooseErrorTests.HelloRetryRequest-DuplicateCurve-TLS13: expects 'illegal parameter' but we want to stick with 'decode error'
LooseErrorTests.HelloRetryRequest-DuplicateCookie-TLS13: expects 'illegal parameter' but we want to stick with 'decode error'
LooseErrorTests.EncryptedExtensionsWithKeyShare-TLS13: expects 'unsupported extension' but RFC requires 'illegal parameter'
LooseErrorTests.Resume-Client-Mismatch-TLS13-TLS12-TLS: server requests a downgrade to TLS 1.2, echoing the random session ID during a TLS 1.3 resumption. => error mapping conflict

DisabledTests.*RSA_PKCS1_MD5_SHA1: We do not implement MD5/SHA1 concatenation anyway
DisabledTests.Compliance-fips202205-*: We do not have explicit support for a FIPS TLS policy
DisabledTests.Compliance-fips-202205-*: We do not have explicit support for a FIPS TLS policy
DisabledTests.Compliance-wpa-202304-*: We do not have explicit support for the WPA Enterprise mode
DisabledTests.CBCRecordSplitting*: No need to split CBC records in TLS 1.2
DisabledTests.*SCSV*: SCSV is meaningless without TLS 1.0/1.1 support
DisabledTests.VersionTolerance-TLS13: We are not tolerating 0x0400 as Client Hello legacy_version
DisabledTests.ExportTrafficSecrets-*: Exporting traffic secrets is not implemented
DisabledTests.TooManyChangeCipherSpec-Client-TLS13: Limits on the number of CCS are not implemented
DisabledTests.TooManyChangeCipherSpec-Server-TLS13: Limits on the number of CCS are not implemented
DisabledTests.TooManyKeyUpdates: Limits on the number of KeyUpdates are not implemented
DisabledTests.TLS12SessionID-TLS13: We don't offer TLS 1.3 when a TLS 1.2 session was found
DisabledTests.Ticket-Forbidden-TLS13: We don't offer TLS 1.3 when a TLS 1.2 session was found
DisabledTests.Resume-Client-NoResume-TLS12-TLS13-TLS: We don't offer TLS 1.3 when a TLS 1.2 session was found
DisabledTests.Resume-Client-Mismatch-TLS12-TLS13-TLS: We don't offer TLS 1.3 when a TLS 1.2 session was found
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-UnofferedCipher-TLS13: BoringSSL will not allow switching ciphers during TLS 1.3 resumption, we do, though.
DisabledTests.HttpGET: TLS 1.3 server does not detect HTTP
DisabledTests.HttpPOST: TLS 1.3 server does not detect HTTP
DisabledTests.HttpPUT: TLS 1.3 server does not detect HTTP
DisabledTests.HttpHEAD: TLS 1.3 server does not detect HTTP
DisabledTests.HttpCONNECT: TLS 1.3 server does not detect HTTP
DisabledTests.SendNoClientCertificateExtensions-TLS13: -signed-cert-timestamps currently not supported in the shim
DisabledTests.KeyUpdate-RequestACK-UnfinishedWrite: -read-with-unfinished-write currently not supported in the shim
DisabledTests.DuplicateCertCompressionExt*: No support for 1.3 cert compression extension
DisabledTests.CertCompression*-TLS13: No support for 1.3 cert compression extension
DisabledTests.SupportedVersionSelection-TLS12: We just ignore the version extension in this case
DisabledTests.Downgrade-*-Client-Ignore: Not possible to ignore downgrade indicator
DisabledTests.ClientHelloPadding: No support for client hello padding extension
DisabledTests.*V2ClientHello*: No support for SSLv2 client hellos
DisabledTests.NotJustKyberKeyShare: BoringSSL specific policy test (we may offer solo PQ/T groups)
DisabledTests.KyberKeyShareIncludedSecond: BoringSSL specific policy test (we may offer solo PQ/T groups)
DisabledTests.KyberKeyShareIncludedThird: BoringSSL specific policy test (we may offer solo PQ/T groups)
DisabledTests.ShimTicketRewritable: Botan has a different ticket format
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-DeclineCrossVersion*: Botan has a different ticket format
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-DeclineBadCipher*: Botan has a different ticket format
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-CipherNotPreferred*: Botan has a different ticket format
DisabledTests.TLS*-NoTicket-NoAccept: BoGo expects that if ticket is issued stateful resumption is impossible
DisabledTests.CheckLeafCurve: Botan doesn't care what curve an ECDSA cert uses
DisabledTests.CertificateVerificationDoesNotFailOnResu: Botan doesn't support reverify on resume
DisabledTests.CertificateVerificationFailsOnResume*: Botan doesn't support reverify on resume
DisabledTests.CertificateVerificationPassesOnResume*: Botan doesn't support reverify on resume
DisabledTests.CipherNegotiation-2: No support for cipher equivalence classes
DisabledTests.CipherNegotiation-3: No support for cipher equivalence classes
DisabledTests.CipherNegotiation-4: No support for cipher equivalence classes
DisabledTests.CipherNegotiation-5: No support for cipher equivalence classes
DisabledTests.CipherNegotiation-8: No support for cipher equivalence classes
DisabledTests.ALPNServer-SelectEmpty-*: Botan treats empty ALPN from callback as a decline
DisabledTests.AppDataAfterChangeCipherSpec-DTLS*: BoringSSL DTLS drops out of order AppData, we reject
DisabledTests.Resume-Client-NoResume-TLS1-TLS11-TLS: BoGo expects resumption attempt sends latest version
DisabledTests.Resume-Client-NoResume-TLS1-TLS12-TLS: BoGo expects resumption attempt sends latest version

DisabledTests.Resume-Client-Mismatch-TLS11-TLS12-TLS: BoGo expects resumption attempt sends latest version
DisabledTests.Resume-Client-Mismatch-TLS1-TLS12-DTLS: BoGo expects resumption attempt sends latest version
DisabledTests.LooseInitialRecordVersion-TLS12: Botan is somewhat strict about the record version number
DisabledTests.CurveTest-*-Compressed*: Point compression is supported, which BoGo doesn't expect
DisabledTests.PointFormat-*-MissingUncompressed: Point compression is supported, which BoGo doesn't expect
DisabledTests.Renegotiate-Client-Packed: Packing HelloRequest with Finished loses the HelloRequest (bug)
DisabledTests.SendHalfHelloRequest*PackHandshake: Packing HelloRequest with Finished loses the HelloRequest (bug)
DisabledTests.PartialClientFinishedWithClientHello: Need to check for buffered messages when CCS (bug)
DisabledTests.SendUnencryptedFinished-DTLS: Need to check for buffered messages when CCS (bug)
